alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 7:17PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern La Paz County through 800 PM MST... At 717 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles south of Alamo Lake State Park, or 13 miles south of Alamo Lake, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wenden and Salome. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
